ygData.subject: Forms and Features - MAXIMALS!
ygData.msgSnippet: The CR chambers hummed and churned as lights blinked and sensor scans flickered back and forth. For some it meant repairs, for others it meant a change of form

Subject: Forms and Features - MAXIMALS!
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=435352480; y=Oo7u-X83eSnkuBWHgajZ59H8a54ir9yliLgs62fJGwAzkc4GCvcBgA

The CR chambers hummed and churned as lights blinked and sensor scans
flickered back and forth. For some it meant repairs, for others it
meant a change of form and even some substance. Energy fed through
power cable as computer code and data streamed as well. There was new
lives starting and old ones connecting and reconnecting. Things were
changing and realigning.

What would the future hold, would new features were to be added to
this landscape that they wee creating?

Only time would tell.

The CR chambers blinked one last time as they indicated that their
occupants had passed through and had been converted.

After a moment the doors hissed and then slid open.

(TAG)

- Preston
